list_definition.mean_english: dầu gội đầu, dầu rửa thảm
list_definition.definition: a soapy liquid or other substance for washing the hair and scalp or for cleaning carpets, upholstery etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: a special shampoo for greasy hair

list_definition.mean_english: sự gội đầu, sự rửa thảm
list_definition.definition: an act of washing etc with shampoo

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I had a shampoo and set at the hairdresser’s.

list_definition.definition: to wash or clean with shampoo

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She shampoos her hair every day

list_ex_of_english: Hempseed oil has found some limited use in the production of soaps, shampoos and detergents.
Antichlors are sometimes added to shampoos for treating hair after swimming in chlorinated water.
Demodectic mange with secondary infection is treated with antibiotics and medicated shampoos.
Antiseptic and antibiotic shampoos (chlorhexidine or benzoyl peroxide) are used to manage further secondary bacterial infection.
Many women, if they knew what went on, would not use the cosmetics and shampoos that are now available.
Dandruff shampoos often contain sodium dodecyl sulfate, a noted skin irritant.
Sessions included shampooing, oiling, combing, braiding, and twisting, plus adding accessories.
Because of its effect on skin cells, salicylic acid is used in several shampoos to treat dandruff.
